openingcreate.title: Job post submitted
openingcreate.description: Your post will be live as soon as the Decentraland Foundation team has assessed and approved the details.

openingcontact.title: Application sent
openingcontact.description: Your profile has been sent to the company or project that publishd the job offer. You will receive a copy by e-mail.

professionalcreate.title: Profile created
professionalcreate.description: Your profile will go live once approved by the team at the Decentraland Foundation.

professionalcontact.title: Message sent
professionalcontact.description: Your message has been sent to the professional. You will receive a copy by e-mail.
